long_description: The Marin Larkspur CS2 bike is well suited to commuting and recreational fitness rides, employing easy-rolling 700c wheels and an upright riding position for enhanced visibility and comfort. The Larkspur's overall geometry, adjustable stem and straight handlebar provide a comfortable upright ride; seat suspension absorbs bumps. Shaped aluminum frame features anti-flex seatstays and chainstays to maximize efficiency. Shimano EZ-FIRE shifters and Shimano front and rear derailleurs provide responsive shifting through all 21 gear combinations. Linear-pull brakes with modulation let you ease in the braking power for controlled deceleration. 700c rims and tires provide a ''large wheel'' ride, great for efficiently cruising on your commute. Puncture-resistant Schwalbe Road Cruiser tires add confidence on long country rides; they're wide as road tires go, boosting stability at slow speeds. Specifications on the Marin Larkspur CS2 bike are subject to change.
